scripts.postinstall: npx lerna link --force-local; npx lerna run build; npx lerna run copy:package:cjs
scripts.test: npm run test:unit; npm run test:lint
scripts.publish:packages: npm run test; npx lerna publish
scripts.clean:modules: rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock package-lock.json lerna-debug.log yarn-error.log
scripts.clean:packages: lerna exec -- rm -rf dist node_modules yarn.lock yarn-error.log package-lock.json
scripts.clean:package-modules: lerna exec -- rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock yarn-error.log package-lock.json
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean; npm run clean:modules; npm run clean:packages
scripts.link:all: npx lerna exec -- npm run unlink; npx lerna exec -- npm run link
scripts.link:all-force: npx lerna exec -- npm run unlink; npm run link:all
